pkgmetadata.longdescription: # memcacheExperimental memcached client library for python. This project is in WIP status, please don't use it in production environment.Key features:- Based on memcached's new meta commands;- Asyncio support;- Type hints.## Installation```sh$ pip install memcache```## About the ProjectMemcache is © 2020-2021 by [aisk](https://github.com/aisk).### LicenseMemcache is distributed by a [MIT license](https://github.com/aisk/memcache/tree/master/LICENSE).
